people_details.description: hand actively writing on the paper

layout.foreground: occupying most of the image, positioned flat and slightly tilted
layout.background: list with checkboxes next to each item

perception.setting: personal or casual setting like a home or office
perception.lighting: natural daylight creating a clear and focused environment

narration.main_narration: In this personal workspace, a notebook lies flat and slightly tilted on the surface, filled with graph paper that invites creativity and organization. On the right side of the image, a hand is actively writing with a black pen or pencil, its movements steady and purposeful as it captures ideas and plans. The background features a list adorned with checkboxes next to each item, hinting at tasks being completed. Natural daylight floods the setting, creating a clear and focused environment that enhances concentration and determination.
ambient_descriptions: soft scratching of pen on paper
